frame.name: Topic
frame.definition:
<def-root>A stretch of linguistic discourse or a <fen>Text</fen> that a <fen>Communicator</fen> produces has a <fen>Topic</fen> that it is about.
<ex><fex name="Text">Chapter 5</fex> <t>discusses</t> <fex name="Topic">the issue of transubstantiation</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Text">Smither's essay</fex> is <t>about</t> <fex name="Topic">plane spotting</fex>.</ex> <ex> <fex name="Communicator">Ostrovsky</fex> <t>addresses</t> <fex name="Topic">monetary policy</fex> <fex name="Text">in Chapter 5</fex>.</ex> <ex><fex name="Text">This book</fex> is <fex name="Degree">mostly</fex> <t>about</t> <fex name="Topic">particle physics</fex>.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Text
FE.definition:
<def-root>A set of propositions that is coherent in being about a <fen>Topic</fen>
<ex>Sue bought a <fex name="Text">book</fex> <t>about</t> Pennsylvania</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Communicator
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Communicator</fen> is the person who has produced a <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.
<ex>In his book, <fex name="Communicator">Smithers</fex> <t>discusses</t> cotton production. </ex></def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition:
<def-root>This Frame Element marks expressions that indicate to which <fen>Degree</fen> the <fen>Text</fen> is about the <fen>Topic</fen>
<ex>The article is <fex name="Degree">mostly</fex> <t>about</t> yoga techniques</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Manner
FE.definition:
<def-root>This FE marks expressions in which <fen>Manner</fen> the <fen>Topic</fen> is treated.
<ex>The book <fex name="Manner">carefully</fex> <t>discusses</t> the events leading up to the war</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Status
FE.definition:
<def-root>The Frame Element <fen>Status</fen> is used for expressions that indicate the relative importance of a <fen>Topic</fen> with respect to the other topics that a <fen>Text</fen> is about.
<ex>The book is <fex name="Status">mainly</fex> <t>about</t> 19th century sewage systems</ex> <ex> A <fex name="Status">peripheral</fex> <t>topic</t> of Chapter 3 is Appalachian coal-mining. </ex>
</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The time at which the <fen>Communicator</fen> produces <fen>Text</fen> on a <fen>Topic</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Explanation
FE.definition: <def-root>The reason for which the <fen>Text</fen> or <fen>Communicator</fen> presents the Topic. </def-root>
